english: He told me god would never forgive me .
chinese: 他对我说上帝一定不会赦免我。

english: Remission of sins is promised to those who repent .
There the warden handed jimmy his pardon .
chinese: 在那里，加长把赦免令递给吉米。

english: The penalty may be remitted only by the pope .
chinese: 这项刑罚只能由教皇给予赦免。

english: He was to be contrite and wish to be reconciled .
chinese: 他必须感到悔悟，并且希望得到赦免。
赦免造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: He has to be contrite and wish to be reconciled .
chinese: 他必须感到悔悟，并且希望得到赦免。
请告诉我，你已经赦免了我。

english: In his mercy, allah had seen fit to spare juffure once again .
chinese: 仁慈的真主已答应可以再赦免米富雷村一次了。

english: Since the lion has spared you, i will for this time ratify your pardon .
chinese: 既然狮子饶了你，我这次也赦免你。

english: You will be pleased to hear that the governor has given you a pardon .
chinese: 你听了一定很高兴，州长已经赦免了你。

english: Peter, at the intercession of old savelitch, was spared by pougatcheff .
chinese: 由于老仆沙威里奇的求情，彼得被普加乔夫赦免了。

english: The preacher asked god to forgive us our sins and wash away our iniquities .
chinese: 牧师乞求上帝赦免我们的罪过，涤荡我们的罪孽。

english: The governor has the power to pardon or reduce the sentences of persons convicted of state crimes .
chinese: 州长有权赦免或从轻判决犯了州法的犯人。

english: I should gorge them with gold, i should grant them impunity for their crimes, and they be grateful .
chinese: 我会塞给他们大量的黄金，赦免他们的罪行，他们也会感激不尽了。

english: "i care not for pain, or death, you know i don't; but oh, man! forgive me the trespass i have done! "
chinese: “我不怕苦楚，也不怕死，你知道我不怕，可是，啊，朋友，请你赦免我所犯过的罪过。”
